video.name: Single-handed Pick and Place(GRASP)
video.init:
mng_db('pick-and-place'), 
load_experiment('/home/ros/knowrob_data/logs/robots/cram/pick-and-place/cram_log.owl'), 
owl_parse('package://iai_semantic_maps/owl/room.owl'), 
owl_parse('package://knowrob_srdl/owl/PR2.owl'), 
add_object_with_children('http://knowrob.org/kb/ias_semantic_map.owl#SemanticEnvironmentMap_PM580j'), 
task_type(Tsk, knowrob:'UIMAPerception'), task(Tsk, T), rdf_has(Tsk, knowrob:'perceptionResult', Obj), !,add_object_as_semantic_instance(Obj, Loc, T, SemanticMapInstance), add_object_with_children(SemanticMapInstance), add_agent_visualization(pr2:'PR2Robot1',T), add_trajectory('l_wrist_roll_link', 'http://knowrob.org/kb/cram_log.owl#timepoint_1396512480', 'http://knowrob.org/kb/cram_log.owl#timepoint_1396512517', 0.1).
